Hi Roger,

Sorry you still lost me! I think you need to back up a bit and explain 
in lay mans terms what you want to achieve. Do you want to implement an 
actual search engine where a search phrase is input and a load of 
results are output? or do you want to somehow extend the results from an 
existing search engine?

Colin

Roger Smith wrote:

>Hey all,
>I am going to rephrase my question.
>I guess what I am trying to figure out is if I should
>have a SearchController which has "The Brain" (the
>neural net) and then when it searches it filters the
>search results through the weights to get the ranking
>OR 
>does each Search result have a brain?
>Any thoughts, ideas?
>Thanks,
>Rog
>  
>
